sponsored_colonizer.zhcn_desc: 私人殖民船由私人星域的不明人士资助建造。所以，其中殖民者的思潮可能和主流不同。
sponsored_colonizer.en_desc: Private Colony Ships are funded by unknown actors from the private sector. As a result the colonists may have ethics differing from the majority.
sponsored_colonizer.potential_country_logic:
▲以下条件至少一个满足
▲拥有国民理念：
▲§H企业国度§!
▲§H民营勘探者§!
